original_text:
He was oppressed and afflicted,
    yet he did not open his mouth;
he was led like a lamb to the slaughter,
    and as a sheep before its shearers is silent,
    so he did not open his mouth.
korean_text: 그가 곤욕을 당하여 괴로울 때에도 그의 입을 열지 아니하였음이여 마치 도수장으로 끌려 가는 어린 양과 털 깎는 자 앞에서 잠잠한 양 같이 그의 입을 열지 아니하였도다

sentences.original_text: yet he did not open his mouth
he was led like a lamb to the slaughter
and as a sheep before its shearers is silent
sentences.korean_translation: 털 깎는 자 앞에 잠잠한 양처럼

sentences.original_text: so he did not open his mouth
